verses.verse: "If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1589>steals<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> or a <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H2873>kills<s%> <S%H4376>it,<s%> or sells <S%H7999>it;<s%> he shall pay <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> for an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for a <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>
If the <S%H1590>thief<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> breaking <S%H4290>in,<s%> and is <S%H5221>struck<s%> so that he <S%H4191>dies,<s%> there shall be no guilt of bloodshed for <S%H1818>him.<s%>

If the <S%H8121>sun<s%> has <S%H2224>risen<s%> on <S%H1818>him,<s%> guilt of bloodshed shall be for <S%H7999>him;<s%> he shall make <S%H7999>restitution.<s%> If he has <S%H4376>nothing,<s%> then he shall be sold for his <S%H1591>theft.<s%>

If the stolen <S%H1591>property<s%> <S%H4672>is<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H2416>alive,<s%> whether it is <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> or <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> he shall <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H8147>double.<s%>

"If a <S%H376>man<s%> causes a <S%H7704>field<s%> or <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> to be <S%H1197>eaten,<s%> and <S%H7971>lets<s%> his <S%H1165>animal<s%> <S%H1197>loose,<s%> and it grazes in another <S%H312>man<s%>'s <S%H7704>field,<s%> he shall make <S%H7999>restitution<s%> from the <S%H4315>best<s%> of his own <S%H7704>field,<s%> and from the <S%H4315>best<s%> of his own <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

"If <S%H784>fire<s%> breaks <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H4672>catches<s%> in <S%H6975>thorns<s%> so that the shocks of <S%H1430>grain,<s%> or the standing <S%H1430>grain,<s%> or the <S%H7704>field<s%> are <S%H398>consumed;<s%> he who <S%H1197>kindled<s%> the <S%H1200>fire<s%> shall <S%H7999>surely<s%> make <S%H7999>restitution.<s%>

"If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>delivers<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> or <S%H3627>stuff<s%> to <S%H8104>keep,<s%> and it is <S%H1589>stolen<s%> out of the <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> if the <S%H1590>thief<s%> is <S%H4672>found,<s%> he shall <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H8147>double.<s%>

If the <S%H1590>thief<s%> <S%H3808>isn't<s%> <S%H4672>found,<s%> then the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall come <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> to find out if he <S%H7971>hasn't<s%> put his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H4399>goods.<s%>

For every <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6588>trespass,<s%> whether it be for <S%H7794>ox,<s%> for <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> for <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> for <S%H8008>clothing,<s%> or for any kind of lost <S%H9>thing,<s%> about which one <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> 'This is mine,' the cause of both <S%H8147>parties<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> before <S%H430>God.<s%> He whom <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7561>condemns<s%> shall <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H8147>double<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

"If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>delivers<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> a <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> or any <S%H929>animal<s%> to <S%H8104>keep,<s%> and it <S%H4191>dies<s%> or is <S%H7665>injured,<s%> or driven <S%H7617>away,<s%> no man seeing <S%H7200>it;<s%>

the <S%H7621>oath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall be between them <S%H8147>both,<s%> whether he <S%H7971>hasn't<s%> put his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H4399>goods;<s%> and its <S%H1167>owner<s%> shall <S%H3947>accept<s%> <S%H7999>it,<s%> and he shall not make restitution.
But if it is <S%H1589>stolen<s%> from <S%H7999>him,<s%> he shall make restitution to its <S%H1167>owner.<s%>
If it is torn in <S%H2963>pieces,<s%> let him <S%H935>bring<s%> it for <S%H7999>evidence.<s%> He shall not make good that which was <S%H2966>torn.<s%>

"If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>borrows<s%> anything of his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s, and it is <S%H7665>injured,<s%> or <S%H4191>dies,<s%> its <S%H1167>owner<s%> not being with <S%H5973>it,<s%> he shall <S%H7999>surely<s%> make <S%H7999>restitution.<s%>
If its <S%H1167>owner<s%> is with <S%H7999>it,<s%> he shall not make it good. If it is a <S%H7916>leased<s%> <S%H935>thing,<s%> it came for its <S%H7939>lease.<s%>

"If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6601>entices<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> who <S%H781>isn't<s%> pledged to be married, and <S%H7901>lies<s%> with <S%H4117>her,<s%> he shall surely <S%H4117>pay<s%> a dowry for her to be his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

If her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3985>utterly<s%> <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> her to <S%H8254>him,<s%> he shall pay <S%H3701>money<s%> according to the <S%H4119>dowry<s%> of <S%H1330>virgins.<s%>
"You shall not allow a <S%H3784>sorceress<s%> to <S%H2421>live.<s%>
"Whoever has <S%H7901>sex<s%> with an <S%H929>animal<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
"He who <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> to any <S%H430>god,<s%> <S%H1115>except<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2763>only,<s%> shall be utterly destroyed.
"You shall not <S%H3238>wrong<s%> an <S%H1616>alien,<s%> neither shall you <S%H3905>oppress<s%> <S%H1616>him,<s%> for you were aliens in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
"You shall not take <S%H6031>advantage<s%> of any <S%H490>widow<s%> or fatherless <S%H3490>child.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> you take <S%H6031>advantage<s%> of them at <S%H6817>all,<s%> and they <S%H6817>cry<s%> at <S%H6817>all<s%> to <S%H8085>me,<s%> I will surely <S%H8085>hear<s%> their <S%H6818>cry;<s%>

and my <S%H639>wrath<s%> will grow <S%H2734>hot,<s%> and I will <S%H2026>kill<s%> you with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and your <S%H802>wives<s%> shall be <S%H490>widows,<s%> and your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3490>fatherless.<s%>

"If you <S%H3867>lend<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to any of my <S%H5971>people<s%> with you who is <S%H6041>poor,<s%> you shall not be to him as a <S%H5383>creditor;<s%> neither shall you <S%H7760>charge<s%> him <S%H5392>interest.<s%>

If <S%H2254>you<s%> <S%H2254>take<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H8008>garment<s%> as <S%H2254>collateral,<s%> you shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> it to him <S%H5704>before<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goes <S%H935>down,<s%>

for that is his only <S%H3682>covering,<s%> it is his <S%H8071>garment<s%> for his <S%H5785>skin.<s%> What would he <S%H7901>sleep<s%> <S%H6817>in?<s%> It will happen, when he cries to <S%H8085>me,<s%> that I will hear, for I am <S%H2587>gracious.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H7043>blaspheme<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> nor <S%H779>curse<s%> a <S%H5387>ruler<s%> of your <S%H5971>people.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H309>delay<s%> to offer from your <S%H4395>harvest<s%> and from the <S%H1831>outflow<s%> of your <S%H5414>presses.<s%> "You shall give the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of your sons to <S%H1121>me.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>likewise<s%> with your <S%H7794>cattle<s%> and with your <S%H6629>sheep.<s%> <S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> it shall be with its <S%H517>mother,<s%> then on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall give it to <S%H5414>me.<s%>

"You shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H398>me,<s%> therefore you shall not eat any <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is torn by <S%H2966>animals<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%> You shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> it to the <S%H3611>dogs.<s%>
